summary: Looking forward to spending time with Grandma Roberts, Barbie, her sisters, and four cute puppies embark on an exciting treasure-hunt in their hometown of Willows. All that they need to do is to follow the clues. What could the prize be?
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Kazumi Evans|Claire Margaret Corlett|Alyssya Swales|Chelsea Miller|Taylor Dianne Robinson|Bronwen Holmes|Amelia Shoichet-Stoll|Joanne Wilson|Rebecca Shoichet|Michael Daingerfield|Sam Vincent|Morgan Taylor Campbell|Brian Dobson
title: Barbie y sus hermanas: Perritos en busca del tesoro
